title: LOCATION! 6+6.5 w/pool + spa, available furnished! (3944 Alonzo)
posting_body: Lake Encino 6+6.5 w/pool + spa, available furnished!
Available furnished or unfurnished, great for short term relocations!
Stunning 2 story, Tudor style home in Lake Encino FOR LEASE!

Amenities include: sprawling floorplan w/6BR + 6.5BA + almost 6000 SQF of space; double door entry leads to foyer; living room w/fireplace; family room w/fireplace + bar for entertaining; upgraded kitchen w/breakfast nook, walk-in pantry + newer stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, range, double ovens, dishwasher + wine fridge); formal dining room w/built-in buffet; downstairs bedroom + bath; den/bonus room – perfect for office or game room; upstairs master suite w/so much to offer - 2 balconies, fireplace, walk-in closet, wet bar + sitting area; HUGE master bath featuring steam shower, dry sauna, soaking tub + dual vanities; loft space; laundry room w/washer + dryer hook-ups; central heat + air; recessed lighting; carpet, ceramic tile + hard wood flooring throughout; central vacuum; intercom; backyard w/heated pool + spa, built-in BBQ + patio; gardener + pool service provided; city lights + mountain views; gated entry; 3 car garage w/auto opener + driveway for parking; pets considered w/owners approval + additional deposit.
For more info or to view this listing, please call us at
All appointments must be scheduled through H&H, not a third-party website, and prospective tenants must confirm showings prior to appointment.
Third-party applications will not be accepted.
Please submit your application, review the Application Instructions and Pet Policy on our website, <URL> under the Vacancies tab.
